outputs.output_descr: Programme outcomes linked to each of the three components focus on: (i) enhancing inclusiveness of poor and vulnerable mainstreaming institutional and policy frameworks and private sector participation in job-rich & pro-poor growth; (ii) empowering the poor and vulnerable (in particular women and youth) as economic agents and (iii) operationalizing, strengthening and sustaining programme coordination.

project_descr: The overall outcomes are to enhance and mainstream poor and vulnerable in institutional and policy frameworks and empower them as economic agents by enhancing entrepreneurship, vocational skills, promoting value chain development and business models.
